Summary: It was a burning flame that just hovered and seemed suspended, high up in the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsTonight after the Fireworks, my boyfriend and I were walking back to our car. He looked up and said, "What's that?". I looked and said, "I don't know". It was a burning flame that just hovered and seemed suspended, high up in the sky. We stood watching this for about 2-3 minutes and another man stopped and looked up, too. He said, "What's that?". We both replied, "We don't know". Never seen anything like that before. (This was about 10:18 CST)in the southern sky. The flame looked orange and yellow and eventually got smaller and smaller, until it disappeared. P.S. There was someone else who posted UFO and 2 witnesses and now the post appears to be gone. I joined GLP tonight because I too saw this and wanted to add to his post. No pics. My boyfriend's iPhone wasn't able to photograph this. There were 3 of us that stood there watching this in disbelief.
